title: Button groups
summary: Button spacing helps create clear relationships between actions and ensures buttons feel balanced within a layout. The spacing depends on how the buttons are arranged, side by side or stacked, and should always feel visually connected to the surrounding form or content.

columns.content:
Adjust the spacing slightly based on button size, this approach maintains consistent visual rhythm while clearly grouping related actions.

*   Large buttons: use M (16). 
    
*   Medium buttons: use S (12). 
    
*   Small buttons: use XS (8).

When buttons are stacked vertically, use the same spacing values as for horizontal layouts. This keeps spacing consistent across button sizes and breakpoints, maintaining a clear and cohesive relationship between all actions in the group.
